resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103786</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103786</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765087151</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">"Under the Stars and Stripes."</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">"unter dem Sternenbanner."</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">"sous Tient le premier rôle et des raies."</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">"sob as estrelas e os listras."</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">"sotto le stelle e le bande."</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">"Κάτω από τα αστέρια και τα λωρίδες."</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">"bajo las estrellas y las rayas."</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Although by 1919 radical and labor movements had been seriously weakened by the government's repression and persecution during World War I, loyalty" organizations and the U.S. Department of Justice used fears spawned by the Bolshevik revolution in Russia to prosecute a crusade against radicals</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Obgleich durch 1919 radikal und Arbeiterbewegungen 
ernsthaft durch der die Unterdrückung und Verfolgung Regierung 
während des Ersten Weltkrieges geschwächt worden war, verwendeten 
Loyalität"Organisationen und das VEREINIGTE STAATEN Justizministerium
die Furcht, die durch die Bolschewikumdrehung in Rußland gelaicht 
wurde, um einen Kreuzzug gegen Radikale zu verfolgen</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Bien que par 1919 radicaux et mouvements de travail ait 
été sérieusement affaibli par la répression et la persécution du 
gouvernement pendant la guerre mondiale I, organismes de fidélité 
les "et le ministère de la justice des ETATS-UNIS ont utilisé des 
craintes engendrées par la révolution de bolchévique en Russie pour
poursuivre une croisade contre des radicaux</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Embora por 1919 radicais e por movimentos labor fosse 
enfraquecido seriamente pelo repression e pelo persecution do governo 
durante o world.war.i, organizações da lealdade as "e o departamento
de ESTADOS UNIDOS de justiça usaram os medos spawned pela volta do 
bolshevik em Rússia para prosecute um crusade de encontro aos 
radicais</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Anche se tramite 1919 radicali e movimenti di lavoro era 
stato indebolito seriamente tramite la repressione ed il persecution 
del governo durante il world.war.i, le organizzazioni di lealtà "ed 
il reparto degli STATI UNITI di giustizia hanno usato i timori deposti
le uova dalla rivoluzione del bolshevik in Russia per proseguire un 
crusade contro i radicali</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αν και μέχρι το 1919 οι μετακινήσεις ριζοσπαστών και
εργασίας ήταν αποδυναμωμένων σοβαρά από την κυβερνητικές 
καταστολή και τη δίωξη κατά τη διάρκεια του παγκόσμιου πολέμου 
Ι, οργανώσεις πίστης οι "και το ΑΜΕΡΙΚΑΝΙΚΟ τμήμα δικαιοσύνης 
χρησιμοποίησαν τους φόβους που ωοτοκήθηκαν από την μπολσεβικική 
επανάσταση στη Ρωσία για να διώξουν ποινικώς μια σταυροφορία 
ενάντια στους ριζοσπάστες</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aunque por 1919 radicales y movimientos de trabajo había 
sido debilitado seriamente por la represión y la persecución del 
gobierno durante Primera Guerra Mundial, organizaciones de la lealtad 
las "y el Ministerio de Justicia de ESTADOS UNIDOS utilizaron los 
miedos spawn/generados por la revolución del bolshevik en Rusia para 
procesar una cruzada contra radicales</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:CENTER FOR HISTORY AND NEW MEDIA/AMERICAN SOCIAL HISTORY PROJECT
FN:CENTER FOR HISTORY AND NEW MEDIA/AMERICAN SOCIAL HISTORY PROJECT
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765087151</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">No License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103786</entry>
    </identifier>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>

    <item>
      <location>
